name: 3X3B
description:
3X3B is an avoidance game of dexterity, memorization and skill with bullets roughly synced up to the music. There is only one level.

This is a scrapped project I made some time ago that I actually quite liked. However, I had to give it up as Stencyl isn't a very powerful engine and the code I wrote back then was complete garbage. lol

Tip: When you go left at the furthermost left side, you get teleported to the right, and vice-versa. / When you go up at the top, you get teleported to the bottom, and vice-versa.

Controls:

Movement: Arrow Keys

Enter: Select Level, Restart

Backspace: Return to Level Selection Screen

Z: Invincible Mode. It was supposed to only be for testing but I decided I'd put it here in case you wanna see the end without suffering.
